name: POP! (itch) (Fatima Nadeem / Croft)
description:
A 3D game about the journey of a bubble as it feeds on eatable bubbles and avoids sharp obstacles.

Instructions
Use mouse movement to collect eatable bubbles and to dodge obstacles.

Attributions

  • Liquid font by Vladimir Nikolic
  • Seaweed models by Riley
  • Menu background music: 'Cash Machine' by Anno Domini Beats from Youtube Audio Library
  • Level atmospheric sound: 'Ocean game movement water air tank bubbles huge long' from Mixkit
  • Bubble eating sound: 'Liquid bubble' from Mixkit
  • Pop sound: 'Hard pop click' from Mixkit
  • New high score sound from Epidemic Sound
  • The rest is self-created/designed
